# The Basics {#part-basics}

In order to effectively use statistical audit sampling techniques, it is
important to have a basic understanding of statistical concepts in the context
of international auditing standards.

In this part of the book, we go over the basic knowledge required for this book.
Chapter @chap-r introduces the basics of R, a programming language commonly used
for statistical analysis. In Chapter @chap-info, we will cover the fundamental
statistical concepts related to audit sampling.
